about_the_game:
From Pop Chip Musician, Omniboi

Selected tracks, specially recut and mastered for this Omniboi album, a jazz and soul-influenced pop chip emotional journey through the characters and relationships of We Are OFK's score/soundtrack*. Plus an original experimental concerto from composer Nicole Brady & Wldr Ensemble.
detailed_description:

Selected tracks, specially recut and mastered for this Omniboi album, a jazz and soul-influenced pop chip emotional journey through the characters and relationships of We Are OFK's score/soundtrack*. Plus an original experimental concerto from composer Nicole Brady & Wldr Ensemble.
name: We Are OFK - Original Score by Omniboi
